After a long mission on the outskirts of the city, Ruby was walking through the city of Vale with Zwei at her side. Ruby was tried from the mission and her responsibilities as the leader of Team RWBY. As they walked, Ruby's stomach began to growl quite loudly. She came to a stop and looked at Zwei who stared at her quizzically. "I haven't eaten since the start of the mission, Zwei." Ruby defended herself against the dog's glares. " I wonder if there is anything around here to eat."

          Just as Ruby began to look, A voice near by began to shout. " Come and try a fantastic new product that will blow you and others away!" Ruby look in the direction of the voice to saw a man with brown hair wearing a black suit and a black bowlo hat on, standing on the side walk with a table in front of him. Multiple women stood around the table blocking most of the view that was on it. As she came closer to the stand, she could see a many bags containing what seem to be berries. The berries were green in color and as she got to the table, she could smell a very sweet scent from them.

          "Hello Ladies, and Welcome" the man said. "I hope you all are willing to give this new product a try." the man paused for a moment before continuing. " These berries were grown specially to make them sweeter and better for you." the man continued to praise the good nature of these berries before adding " They can be used as a snack or even to make great desserts." The man then moved a bowl in front of Ruby and the other women before saying " Go ahead and try one." Ruby looked the bowl and grab one alongside many others. It really smelt very sweet and didn't look bad at all. Ruby decide the best way to see how it was is to taste it and placed it in her mouth.

          Ruby was instantly hit with a very sweet tasting juice from the berry. Even though the berry was not that big, the amount of juice in it was large. Ruby had never tasted anything like this ever in her life. As she was tasting it, she could see the other women enjoyed it just as much. " Well, Was I not right?" asked the man. "And not a bad bargain either." As the man showed the price for each bag. One by one the women brought bags and went on their way. The man looked at Ruby and said " How about you, MIss?" Ruby looked for a moment and said " I'll take a 10 dozen bags." The man smiled and said " Of course." Ruby payed for the bags and went on her way. As she got a distance away, her belly began to rumble before a quick 3 second fart came out. The smell that came with the fart was horrible. Zwei began to wimpier at the smell as Ruby blushed " Excuse me, I don't know where that came from."

          As Ruby left the man began to pack up and moved to a near by alley. " I would say that went well, would you agree?" As the man walked into the alley, A woman with mutli-colored hair came out of the shadows. " You can remove the illusion now." As the man stated this, he changed from his current look to a man with red hair and his clothes change to white. "Now then, let us go." Roman stated before Neo gave him a blank look. " What." Roman asked. Neo then began to strain and pushed out a long, loud and very smelly 10 second fart before giving him a blank stare again. Roman then began to follow Neo away.

info.description:
The female characters from RWBY start to become gassy and fart. The girls can get like this for many reasons, so feel free to write up any thing that comes to mind within the rules.

Rules:

1. Most other fetishes are allowed, However the stories main focus is farts, try to keep it around that.
2. No killing of named characters from the show.
3. No males farting. Only the female characters fart
4. Try to leave a "More Options" chapter open if possible. I would like to see different ways for the story to go.
5. No short chapters unless it is a character select chapter or deciding on a way to make the girls fart.

Fetishes that are not allowed
Extreme Gore
Hard Vore
Extreme Weight Gain( A little is fine, but no girl is suddenly 300 lbs. heavier)

Any Chapter found to not follow the rules will be removed
